channel.title: 639 Client
channel.description: so im working with the new Eclipse client and i was wondering where i go to change the ip the client connects too and for the server as well. it keeps connecting to a diff ip. and also where do i change the name on the window of the client? in 3.0 it was easy but i cant seem to find it in v3.5. Help please? thank you

item.title: 639 Client
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

saltywalrus:

so im working with the new Eclipse client and i was wondering where i go to change the ip the client connects too and for the server as well. it keeps connecting to a diff ip. and also where do i change the name on the window of the client? in 3.0 it was easy but i cant seem to find it in v3.5. Help please? thank you

client.java Loader.java RunClient.java
Those all have ips in them.

Read full topic
